.panel{

}
body{
 font-family: Open Sans !important;

}

}

	margin-top: 10px;

html,

body {

a:focus {

}

}
.breadcrumbs-container a {
    color: #fff;
}
.nav > li > a:hover,
.nav > li > a:focus {
    text-decoration: none;
    background-color: #86bc25;
    border-radius: 0;
}
.sp-tagline-color {
    color: #75787b;
}
a.list-group-item {
    color: #000 !important;
}
.btn-default {
    color: #fff;
    background-color: #86bc25;
    border-color: #86BC25;
}
/*side bar*/

.sideBar {
    margin-top: 10px;
}
.sideBar .panel-heading .panel-title {
    color: #fff;
    font-size: 20px;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.sideBar a:hover,
.sideBar a:focus {
    color: #000;
}
.panel-body > .list-group li.list-group-item,
.panel-body a {
    color: #000;
}
.label-as-badge {
    background-color: #86bc25;
    border: 1px solid #86BC25;
    color: #fff;
}
.panel-primary > .panel-heading {
    color: #fff;
    background-color: #86bc25;
    border-color: #86BC25;
}
.sideBar .label-as-badge.label-primary {
    background-color: #86BC25;
    color: #fff;
}
.sideBar .list-group {
    padding: 0px !important;
}
.sideBar .list-group-item {
    padding: 10px !important;
}
.list-group-item:hover,
.list-group-item:focus,
button.list-group-item:hover,
button.list-group-item:focus {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #000;
    background-color: #f2f2f2;
  cursor:pointer;
}
/*right section */

.rightSection {
    margin-top: 10px;
}
.rightSection .overflow-100 .h4 {
    color: #000;
    font-size: 16px;
}
.rightSection .panel-footer {
    padding: 10px 15px;
    background-color: #f2f2f2;
    border-top: 1px solid #f2f2f2;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 2px;
    border-bottom-left-radius: 2px;
    color: #000 !important;
}
.rightSection .overflow-100 .text-muted {
    color: #53565A;
}
.searchBox .btn-default:focus,
.searchBox .btn-default {
    color: #fff;
    background-color: #86bc25;
    border-color: #86BC25;
}
.searchBox .dropdown-menu a.ta-item {
	color:#000 !important;
}
.searchBox .dropdown-menu .active a{
	background:none !important;
}
.searchBox .dropdown-menu li:hover {
	
  background-color:#0076A8;
}
.searchBox .dropdown-menu li a.ta-item:hover {
	color:#fff !important;
  
}
.rightSection ul.list-group li.list-group-item a+div
{
	color: #646567;
}</css><draft>false</draft><dynamic_title_structure/><id>au_kb_view2</id><internal>false</internal><public>false</public><roles/><short_description/><sys_class_name>sp_page</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>tbasak</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-01-31 05:54:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>7246ef8edb1fab805cfc126b3a96191b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>au_kb_view2</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_page_7246ef8edb1fab805cfc126b3a96191b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>tbasak</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-31 07:09:50</sys_updated_on><title>Australia Knowledge Base</title></sp_page><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=7246ef8edb1fab805cfc126b3a96191b"/></record_update>
